cast.name: 沙欣·伊尔马克 Sahin Irmak

director.name: 奥赞·阿西克坦 Ozan Açiktan

trans_title: 这些都是非常感人的电影
introduction: Everyone has different expectations of summer. And Comedy Kitchen: Holiday Recipes has a place for them all.Those who find their long-awaited summer romance and then think, What a letdown!; those who take short holidays and push it too hard; those left to the mercy of mosquitoes when they can't take a holiday; those whose holidays don't go according to plan; those who work day in, day out and can only get away on Sundays; those who cant decide what to wear at the end-of-year summer ball; those who don't know the value of the best summer gift, a bicycle; those who have to fly to their summer holiday destination; those struggling to get used to school when the summer holidays end...
chinese_title: 这些都是非常感人的电影
